Playground.title: Dashboard Playground
Playground.description: Test your queries and see how they would appear in the dashboard before adding them to your project.
Playground.configurationDescription: Enter your API keys and test parameters to simulate a dashboard view
Playground.openAiApiKeyDescription: Your OpenAI API key for GPT models
Playground.projectDomainDescription: Your clinic or medical facility domain
Playground.keywordQueryDescription: The medical service or query to test (e.g., "dental implants", "best cardiologist")
Playground.simulatedDashboardView: Simulated dashboard view based on your test query
Playground.runSimulationToSee: Run a simulation to see the dashboard preview
Playground.runningComprehensiveAnalysis: Running comprehensive analysis of your domain and query...
Playground.simulationPreview: This is a simulation preview. Results are not saved to your project.
Playground.fillInConfiguration: Fill in the configuration above and click "Simulate Dashboard" to see results
Playground.invalidApiKeys: Invalid API keys. Please check your OpenAI and Perplexity API keys.

validation.domainInvalid: Please enter a valid domain (e.g., mayoclinic.org)

contentAudit.title: Content Optimization
contentAudit.description: Analysis of website content in terms of its usability and GEO optimization

4_1.title: Department Pages
4_1.description: Presence of separate pages for each clinic department with unique content.

4_2.title: Service Pages
4_2.description: Detailed service pages on separate URLs.

4_3.title: Doctor Pages
4_3.description: Personal profiles with biographies, experience, and photos.

4_4.title: Site Architecture
4_4.description: Logical hierarchy and quality of internal linking.

4_5.title: Blog
4_5.description: Presence of an articles section to demonstrate expertise.

4_8.title: Authority Links
4_8.description: Citations of official medical organizations and journals.

4_9.title: FAQ
4_9.description: Section with answers to typical patient questions.

4_10.title: Address
4_10.description: Clear physical address of the clinic or branches.

4_11.title: Phone
4_11.description: Presence of a phone number with one-tap calling capability.

eeatAudit.title: E-E-A-T Assessment
eeatAudit.description: Analysis of Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness signals

5_1.title: Content Authors
5_1.description: Presence of information about medical article authors and their qualifications.

5_2.title: Doctor Profiles
5_2.description: Completeness of information in specialist profiles (education, experience, certificates).

5_3.title: Scientific Sources
5_3.description: Citations of authoritative medical publications and databases (PubMed, WHO, Cochrane).

5_4.title: Social Proof
5_4.description: Mentions in media, participation in conferences and professional associations.

5_5.title: Cases and Results
5_5.description: Treatment examples, before/after photos, patient stories.

5_6.title: Legal Transparency
5_6.description: Presence of complete legal entity details and contact information.

5_7.title: Medical Licenses
5_7.description: Display of active MOH licenses and accreditation certificates.

5_8.title: Privacy Policy
5_8.description: Compliance with personal data processing and medical confidentiality requirements.

5_9.title: External Ratings
5_9.description: Presence and level of ratings on independent platforms (Google Maps, Doc.ua, etc.).

5_10.title: Contact
5_10.description: Appointment booking, online consultations, and active contact forms.

5_11.title: Currency
5_11.description: Regular content updates and medical information dating.
